hero.headline: Hi, I'm Ollie.
hero.subheadline: Senior B2B marketer with a creative-technical foundation in video, design, and UX. I build AI-powered marketing systems, workflow automation, and content strategies that drive pipeline efficiency and measurable growth.

content.title: Ollie Pinto
content.bio: Creative meets systems. I help marketing teams run smoothly, so there's less firefighting and more room for strategy.

content.title: Creative Background
content.text: Built a creative-technical foundation through video, motion, UI/UX, and brand work. Those skills now underpin how I build scalable marketing systems and creative campaign execution.

content.desc: Final project: Drops Music, a mobile app concept. Designed the UI, built an animated prototype, and directed video content to bring it to life. Praised for innovative design and user experience.

work.headline: Experience Archive
work.subheadline: Recent roles and the early foundations that shaped how I build marketing systems.

projects.short_desc: Scaled LinkedIn performance, built AI lead qualification, and reduced CRM costs.
full_desc: Grew LinkedIn performance vs prior-year baseline: impressions +126%, engagements +268% (organic). Shaped tone of voice, ran performance standups, and turned insights into optimisations.

Designed and implemented an AI-powered lead qualification system (Make.com + OpenAI) that filters inbound leads, scores against ICP criteria, enriches company data, and routes qualified MQLs to sales. Reduced unqualified pipeline by 49%.
Built custom AI content tools that cut the brief-to-draft cycle by ~70% while keeping brand consistency and ICP alignment.
Led CRM evaluation and migration from a high-cost platform to an optimised solution. Delivered a 66% cost reduction (about GBP 5,800 annual savings) and improved deliverability and campaign tracking.
Collaborated with sales and product to align messaging with customer pain points, improving lead-to-opportunity conversion.
Managed WordPress CMS and implemented technical optimisations that improved site performance and user experience.

projects.short_desc: Drove partnership campaigns and social growth for Sky Broadband Gaming Plan.
full_desc: Supported marketing strategy that helped secure $1.1m revenue for the Sky Broadband Gaming Plan through campaign planning and cross-functional execution.
Led social media activity for the Sky partnership, contributing to 80.6m impressions across key gaming audiences.
Led website redesign initiative, owning copywriting and SEO strategy in collaboration with an external developer.
Developed B2B marketing strategy, including investor newsletters and LinkedIn content cadence.
Built a custom AI tone-of-voice tool to maintain brand messaging consistency at scale.

projects.short_desc: Supported a B2B rebrand and investor marketing for Private Credit.
full_desc: Contributed to the B2B rebrand of the Private Credit division, supporting brand positioning and campaign execution.
Executed campaigns that increased engagement with individual and institutional investors through targeted messaging and multi-channel distribution.
Managed external suppliers for video, webinar, and presentation production to ensure brand consistency and on-time delivery.
Supported digital marketing initiatives including website UX/SEO improvements and LinkedIn campaign management.
